page.title: 12BANK HOLIDAY ACTIVITIES
page.content: On May Day Bank Holiday we went to the Royal Horticultural Society's Wisley Garden. We went down to the Pinetum. It was in the shade. The car park was packed solid. At the Pinetum we saw lots of pine, spruce, fir and cedar trees. We went into the green_ house. They were selling Scots Pine for Â£8.50. It would be much cheaper to grow them ourselves. ______________________________________ In the morning I woke at 7 a.m. As it was Bank Holiday I stayed in bed until 9 a.m. I washed, dressed and put on my track suit. I went downstairs for breakfast.Then my brother and I caught bees for Daddy to put on the straw- berries in the greenhouse. We went to the pub for a drink before lunch.I had two bottles of apple juice and a packet of crisps.After lunch I played with my cat and went on the swing.
